answer: <p><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/JSON/parse" rel="noreferrer"><code>JSON.parse(jsonString)</code></a> is a pure JavaScript approach so long as you can guarantee a reasonably modern browser.</p>
